content:
Craft an item of type: warped_door
inventory=[{"type": "stripped_crimson_hyphae", "quantity": 47, "index": 14}, {"type": "snow_block", "quantity": 52, "index": 15}, {"type": "green_terracotta", "quantity": 51, "index": 20}, {"type": "warped_stem", "quantity": 2, "index": 21}, {"type": "cyan_carpet", "quantity": 17, "index": 34}]
thought: To craft warped_door, I first need to craft warped_planks. Warped_planks require 1 warped_stem, which is in slot 21. Therefore I will move the warped_stem to slot 1 in the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 21 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: warped_door
inventory=[{"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "warped_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stripped_crimson_hyphae", "quantity": 47, "index": 14}, {"type": "snow_block", "quantity": 52, "index": 15}, {"type": "green_terracotta", "quantity": 51, "index": 20}, {"type": "warped_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 21}, {"type": "cyan_carpet", "quantity": 17, "index": 34}]
thought: Now that I have crafted warped_planks, I need to move them to an empty inventory slot (eg., 11) so that I can craft more warped_planks.
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4

Craft an item of type: warped_door
inventory=[{"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "stripped_crimson_hyphae", "quantity": 47, "index": 14}, {"type": "snow_block", "quantity": 52, "index": 15}, {"type": "green_terracotta", "quantity": 51, "index": 20}, {"type": "warped_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 21}, {"type": "cyan_carpet", "quantity": 17, "index": 34}]
thought: I need to craft warped_planks in order to craft a warped_door. To do this, I need to place 1 warped_stem on the crafting grid, so I will move the warped_stem from slot 21 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 21 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: warped_door
inventory=[{"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "warped_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "stripped_crimson_hyphae", "quantity": 47, "index": 14}, {"type": "snow_block", "quantity": 52, "index": 15}, {"type": "green_terracotta", "quantity": 51, "index": 20}, {"type": "cyan_carpet", "quantity": 17, "index": 34}]
thought: I have now crafted warped_planks, so I need to move them from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 12).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 4

Craft an item of type: warped_door
inventory=[{"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 12}, {"type": "stripped_crimson_hyphae", "quantity": 47, "index": 14}, {"type": "snow_block", "quantity": 52, "index": 15}, {"type": "green_terracotta", "quantity": 51, "index": 20}, {"type": "cyan_carpet", "quantity": 17, "index": 34}]

thought: To craft a warped door, I need to place three warped planks on top of each other. I have two stacks of warped planks in my inventory, and I'll start with the stack at slot 11. I'll move one plank from that stack to slot 1 of the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: warped_door
inventory=[{"type": "warped_button", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 3, "index": 11}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 12}, {"type": "stripped_crimson_hyphae", "quantity": 47, "index": 14}, {"type": "snow_block", "quantity": 52, "index": 15}, {"type": "green_terracotta", "quantity": 51, "index": 20}, {"type": "cyan_carpet", "quantity": 17, "index": 34}]
thought: Now that I've placed one warped plank in the crafting grid, I need to place another one below it. I'll move another plank from the stack at slot 11 to slot 2 of the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 2 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: warped_door
inventory=[{"type": "warped_pressure_plate", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 2, "index": 11}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 12}, {"type": "stripped_crimson_hyphae", "quantity": 47, "index": 14}, {"type": "snow_block", "quantity": 52, "index": 15}, {"type": "green_terracotta", "quantity": 51, "index": 20}, {"type": "cyan_carpet", "quantity": 17, "index": 34}]
thought: Finally, I need to place a third warped plank below the second one. I'll move the last plank from the stack at slot 11 to slot 4 of the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 4 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: warped_door
inventory=[{"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 12}, {"type": "stripped_crimson_hyphae", "quantity": 47, "index": 14}, {"type": "snow_block", "quantity": 52, "index": 15}, {"type": "green_terracotta", "quantity": 51, "index": 20}, {"type": "cyan_carpet", "quantity": 17, "index": 34}]
thought: I don't have enough warped planks in the crafting grid to craft a warped door, so I'll move one more plank from the stack at slot 11 to slot 5 of the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 5 with quantity 1

Ok
